meanings.definition: The state or quality of being awkward or clumsy in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her gawkinesses made her trip over her own feet.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but notice his gawkinesses as he tried to dance.
meanings.sent3: His gawkinesses at the party were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The gawkinesses of the new student stood out like a sore thumb.
meanings.sent5: The gawkinesses of the puppy learning to walk was endearing.

meanings.definition: The awkward or clumsy behavior or appearance of someone.
meanings.sent1: The gawkinesses of the child trying to tie his shoes was adorable.
meanings.sent2: She tried to hide her gawkinesses during the talent show.
meanings.sent3: His gawkinesses in the play made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The gawkinesses of the scarecrow in the field added charm to the farm.
meanings.sent5: The gawkinesses of the robot trying to dance was comical.
